name: Institute on Aging
description: Institute on Aging works to enhance the quality of life for adults as they age by enabling them to maintain their health, well-being, independence and participation in the community. As an essential partner in the continuum of care for a diverse population of older adults and disabled adults, IOA provides health services, social and emotional support, and education and advocacy through innovative, community-based programs that enable clients to live at home for as long as possible.
